subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: For the first time in his career, Tiger Woods has posted second-place finishes in consecutive majors — a stretch that at the least reveals some vulnerability in the No. 1 ranked player in the world.
snippet: For the first time in his career, Tiger Woods has posted second-place finishes in consecutive majors — a stretch that at the least reveals some vulnerability in the No. 1 ranked player in the world.
